featured.text: In this movie, Leonardo DiCaprio played both King Louis XIV and his twin brother Philippe.

definition.zh_def: 李奧納多·迪卡普里奧，著名的美國演員和製片人，以其在電影中的出色表現而聞名。
definition.en_def: Leonardo DiCaprio, a renowned American actor and producer known for his outstanding performances in films.
definition.example: Leonardo DiCaprio won an Oscar for his role in 'The Revenant.'
